messages.messageBody:
-=-Benson, a small town in AZ, about 40
miles from Tucson, on 5 acres in the desert.-=-

If a family makes this deal and needs to pass through Albuquerque to
get there, you can stay at our house on the way!

Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Looking for unschoolers family to house sit
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, We are hoping that a family of unschoolers wants to have an adventure and come stay at our house and take care of our pets (dogs, cats, snake, fish)
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

We are hoping that a family of unschoolers wants to have an adventure
and come stay at our house and take care of our pets (dogs, cats,
snake, fish) from mid-April til mid-May next year.
We live in a 3 BR house in Benson, a small town in AZ, about 40
miles from Tucson, on 5 acres in the desert. You may be able to use
our car if you need it.
April - May is the best time of year here: beautiful weather and the
desert in bloom!

If your family is interested, please email me off-list at
arbinsy@.... Please forward this to any local lists you might be
on also.

Thanks,

Sybelle
dh Arnold
ds Ingo (13)
dd Bibiana (10)
